name: Take a Leap
summary:
When was the last time you took a leap of faith?

This mixed reality game strips everything back to basics — no frills, no distractions. Just you, your courage, and the thrill of the jump. Whether you're playing on your stove, ceiling, window, or door, all you need is one hand or one controller to leap forward.

And when you fail? Get back up and leap again. 

Enjoy WeChat Tiao Yi Tiao (跳一跳) mobile game? You’ll enjoy this
Never ending MR hyper-casual game
Juicy translucent jelly art style
Randomly...
